testcase.classname: users could make a registration on the website to create an account
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user fill your personal details field..................................passed And user fill company details...............................................passed And user fill your password field...........................................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user could register successfully.......................................passed

testcase.classname: user could log in to his\her account
testcase.name: User could login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter "mohamedgamal39@gmail.com" and "012345678999"...............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed

testcase.name: user could reset his\her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user open login page..................................................passed When user click on forget password..........................................passed And user write email "mohamedgamal39@gmail.com".............................passed And user click on recover button............................................passed Then user get success massage...............................................passed

testcase.classname: logged users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter "mohamedgamal39@gmail.com" and "012345678999"...............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed When user write product name "Apple"........................................passed And user click on search button.............................................passed Then the search has been completed successfully and get "Apple".............passed

testcase.classname: logged users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using product sku
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter "mohamedgamal39@gmail.com" and "012345678999"...............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed When user write product sku "AP_MBP_13".....................................passed And user click on search button.............................................passed And user select product.....................................................passed Then the search has been completed successfully and get sku "AP_MBP_13".....passed

testcase.classname: logged user could switch between currencies
testcase.name: user could select currency
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter "mohamedgamal39@gmail.com" and "012345678999"...............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed When user select currency...................................................passed Then user change currency successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: logged user could hover categories and select sub category

testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter "mohamedgamal39@gmail.com" and "012345678999"...............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed When user hover category and select subcategory.............................passed Then user could hover successfully..........................................passed
